thread.title: Walton to coach Warriors in Tuesday’s season opener
thread.title_full: Walton to coach Warriors in Tuesday’s season opener - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Walton to coach Warriors in Tuesday’s season opener
text:
Photo: Alex Gallardo, Associated Press Warriors interim head coach Luke Walton looks over his notes in the first half of a preseason game Thursday against the Los Angeles Lakers in Anaheim. Warriors interim head coach Luke Walton looks over his notes in the...
One year after sailing to their first NBA championship in 40 years, the Warriors are staring at a fresh, formidable challenge: christening the 2015-16 season without head coach Steve Kerr on the bench. Warriors interim head coach Luke Walton looks over his notes in the first half of a preseason game Thursday against the Los Angeles Lakers in Anaheim. Warriors interim head coach Luke Walton looks over his notes in the...
One year after sailing to their first NBA championship in 40 years, the Warriors are staring at a fresh, formidable challenge: christening the 2015-16 season without head coach Steve Kerr on the bench.
